Data Reduction documentation

This package is created to facilitate the data reduction process of the data from the Vienna little telescope (vlt) and the Leopold Figl-Observatory for astrophysik (LFOA).

The whole code is heavily under development and will very possibly change and/or be extended over time. Despite testing as much as possible there might still be a couple of bugs or unintentional behaviour.

Motivation

This project originated from a simple program for a practical session during my bachelor study. In each subsequent practical course the initial program got reworked and extended to provide a more general usage of the program. The source code can be found on my GitHub Repository.
